unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: follower analytics get a desi twist

unnormalised: Alright folks, are you tired of generic follower analytics that just don't *get* the Indian market? Good news! A bunch of new tools are popping up designed specifically for understanding your desi audience. Think insights into festival spending habits, regional language preferences, and even the best time to post for maximum engagement during chai time (around 16:00 hrs, maybe?).
normalised: alright folks, are you tired of generic follower analytics that just don't get the indian market? good news! a bunch of new tools are popping up designed specifically for understanding your desi audience. think insights into festival spending habits, regional language preferences, and even the best time to post for maximum engagement during chai time (around sixteen hundred hours, maybe?).

unnormalised: Forget those vague "peak engagement" times. We're talking granular data that knows the difference between a Diwali sale splurge and a Pongal purchase.
normalised: forget those vague "peak engagement" times. we're talking granular data that knows the difference between a diwali sale splurge and a pongal purchase.

unnormalised: One startup, "Desi Digital," claims their AI can even predict which Bollywood star's endorsement will resonate most with your target demographic. They're launching on 26/01/2024.
normalised: one startup, "desi digital," claims their A I can even predict which bollywood star's endorsement will resonate most with your target demographic. they're launching on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Another tool focuses on identifying fake followers—crucial for weeding out those dodgy accounts before your brand ambassador deal goes south faster than a Delhi summer at 48 degrees C. They’re hosting a webinar on 10/10/2023 at 11:00 hrs.
normalised: another tool focuses on identifying fake followers—crucial for weeding out those dodgy accounts before your brand ambassador deal goes south faster than a delhi summer at forty eight degrees celsius. they’re hosting a webinar on tenth october two thousand and twenty three at eleven hundred hours.

unnormalised: So, if you're looking to level up your influencer marketing game in India, time to ditch the one-size-fits-all approach and embrace these desi-fied follower analytics. Your ROI will thank you, and maybe even bless you with a little bit of Lakshmi's favour! It's all about getting those 'likes' and 'shares', right?
